user_story: As a student, I want a planner that allows me to schedule my classes and assignments so that I can keep track of my academic responsibilities.
generated_ac:
1. The system shall allow a student to add a new class entry, including its name, time, and day.
2. The system shall allow a student to add a new assignment entry, including its name, due date, and associated class.
3. The system shall display a unified view of all scheduled classes and assignments.
4. The system shall allow a student to modify or delete an existing class or assignment entry.
edited_ac:
1. The system shall allow a student to add a new class entry, including its name, time, and day.
2. The system shall allow a student to add a new assignment entry, including its name, due date, and associated class.
3. The system shall display a unified view of all scheduled classes and assignments.
4. The system shall allow a student to modify or delete an existing class or assignment entry.
final_ac:
1. The system shall allow the user to schedule classes and assignments successfully.
2. The system shall handle exceptions without crashing and maintain operational stability.
3. The system shall allow a student to add a new assignment entry, including its name, due date, and associated class.
4. The system shall display a unified view of all scheduled classes and assignments.

selected_criteria_all.text: The system shall allow the user to schedule classes and assignments successfully.
The system shall handle exceptions without crashing and maintain operational stability.
The system shall allow a student to add a new assignment entry, including its name, due date, and associated class.
The system shall display a unified view of all scheduled classes and assignments.
